name: Destruction Tuber Simulator
description:
Destroy items and build up your audience in this official sequel for the popular Hydraulic Press Channel's Hydraulic Press Pocket title! Whether you're bored or stressed; destroying everything helps!

- Unlock all five different destruction methods!
- Find and destroy over 100 items!
- Upgrade your tools and equipment!
- Real voice acting by the Hydraulic Press Channel!

This app offers in-app purchases and advertisements.
